question: What is the theme of the International Day to End Obstetric Fistula 2020?
option1: End gender inequality! End health inequities! End Fistula now!
answer: End gender inequality! End health inequities! End Fistula now!
explanation:
The United Nations observes the International Day to End Obstetric Fistula on May 23, since 2013. The day is observed to raise awareness of the issue and mobilize support from across the world.
Obstetric fistula is one of the most serious injuries that can occur during childbirth. This condition makes the affected women easily prone to infections or other health conditions. The women also face social-stigma in the society. The theme of this year is ‘End gender inequality! End health inequities! End Fistula now!’.
